const[inputEmployeeId,setInputEmployeeId]=useState(employeeId||"");// State for Employee ID input

const fetchEmployeeData=async id=>{setLoading(true);setError(null);// Reset states to avoid showing old data
setEmployee({});setTotalCalls(0);setTotalMessages(0);setAttendanceStatus("N/A");setBasicSalary("N/A");setNumberOfLeaves("N/A");setActualSalary("N/A");try{// Fetch employee data
